channel.title: How to add a JFrame?
channel.description:
I would like to add a JFrame to the bottom part of my client with a vote and forums button, I don't have EGUI or JFrame.java so I'm guessing I have to start from scratch.
I don't really know any java (I do know some) I tried looking up a few tutorials about jframes but they didn't really help me at all due to my lack of knowledge =/
So if someone could help me out I would love that :)
